name: Srijit

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: I can make websites with the latest js frameworks like nextjs and react!

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: Still learning backend but I can make full stack websites using mondodb, firebase and appwrite!

services.title: Miscellanous
services.description: Apart from web development, I can code in python, java and node.js!

services.title: 3D Websites
services.description: I've been using three.js for a while, and I can make 3D websites using three.js/spline/threatre.js!

aboutpara: Hi there üëã! I'm a high school student from India currently studying in 10th grade. I'm passionate about coding and electronics. I love nerd stuff, web development, listening to music, and being productive. Typical Hollywood nerd üßëüèº‚ÄçüíªüôÉ! Welcome to my website!

resume.description: I spend my time learning and building stuff. I love to code and I'm always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow. I have 2 years of experience in web development. I organise hackathons, and lead a coding club in my school. I am currently working on improving my skills, and gaining experience from self-made projects.

experiences.bullets: I organized Kolkata's first hackathon for teenagers.

education.universityPara: Working my way through high school. I'm currently in 10th grade. I lead a high school coding club named Code Cafe which is under the global umbrella of Hack Club.
